definition: eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)

sentences.english: A savage howl, like an ominous setting sun, punctured immortality so slimy and solemn.
sentences.chinese: 有狂野的嗥叫像不祥的残阳击穿粘稠肃穆的永恒。

sentences.english: For whom, for whom, who has waited for eternity in a thousand years?
sentences.chinese: 为谁倾尽一生，为谁把千年等待刻成一个永恒？

sentences.english: "Eternal Lake of Scented Souls", it is growing the value of time and space highlights the eternal realm.
sentences.chinese: “万古香魂”，益加凸现价值时空的永恒境界。

sentences.english: Doubts about this eternal truth come because of the wavering Mind.
sentences.chinese: 对此永恒真理会产生怀疑是因为心念摇摆不定。

sentences.english: With love at first sight, our hearts are linked, changing the moment into eternal love.
sentences.chinese: 只是一见钟情，两颗心已相通，刹那化成永恒情浓。

sentences.english: That is one of the most invariable rules of social behavior.
sentences.chinese: 这是最永恒的社会行为规律之一。

sentences.english: A snowslide may make an everlasting love story, but even the snowslide cannot ensure Eternity.
sentences.chinese: 除非有雪崩，但雪崩也不能保证永恒。

sentences.english: Yet, the drinks that burnt my throat became the story of our past, each in my mind, crystalized.
sentences.chinese: 但是入口的酒却变成往事，一一在我心头永恒。

sentences.english: Since thou eternal life canst give.
sentences.chinese: 而你永恒生命可以给予。

sentences.english: For more than 2,000 years, the pomegranate has been known as a symbol of immortality and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 两千多年来，红石榴被认为是永恒和繁荣的象征。

sentences.english: Through the sadness of all things I hear the crooning of the Eternal Mother.
sentences.chinese: 在万物的哀愁里，我听到了“永恒母亲”的柔声细语。

sentences.english: There'll be green waves forever out there waiting for me.
sentences.chinese: 在那，永恒无尽的绿浪，正等待着我。

sentences.english: We see a promising future of Chinese Aion.
sentences.chinese: 我们看到了中国永恒将来的希望。

sentences.english: It is humankinds eternal topic to study life.
sentences.chinese: 对生命的探索是人类永恒的话题。

sentences.english: In timelessness , there is the possibility of ongoing and unlimited expansion or ascension.
sentences.chinese: 在永恒里，有持续和不受限的扩充和提升的可能性。

sentences.english: There is no such thing as a permanent advertising succe .
sentences.chinese: 广告没有椰棕床垫怎么样永恒的成功。

definition: time and place/world of a particular locale and era/(physics) space-time
life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 輪迴|轮回[lun2 hui2]
to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
